about_the_game:
Life isn't easy as a futuristic rideshare driver, especially when people keep leaving bees in your passenger seat.
Neon Express is a cyberpunk-themed delivery driver simulator. From the helm of your ship, you will be using a computer terminal to accept jobs and transport eccentric people around the city.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild occasional swearing is used for comedic effect.
Occasional mild drug and alcohol references.

short_description: Life isn't easy as a futuristic rideshare driver, especially when people keep leaving bees in your passenger seat. Take the helm in this cyberpunk comedy. Transport the eccentric citizens of the city. Escape your past, and like, overcome class inequity or whatever.
